A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's like re-booting The Empire Strikes Back\, but with different actors. All the elements of the TESB are there: Hoth but with salt instead of snow\, the death of the Jedi master and the Jedi order dying with him\, etc. But this time\, with plot holes and inconsistencies everyone described in detail. How do rebel soldiers enter a casino without a toxedo any security guard problem? This movie doesn't add anything. It even removes the legend of the previous.
